TestMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
TestMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

TestMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
TestMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
TestMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

TestMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
TestMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

TestMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
TestMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !TestMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

TestMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
TestMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theDefault:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
